name: Indian Institute of Technology, Madras
latest_news_and_events:
IIT Madras BS Data Science programmes assists in placing 2,500 students in jobs and promotions, 
    click here(https://docs.google.com/document/d/1JpVhze1d9eZbLD1jbfj6pPtscT-ATXG7/edit). 
    The JEE Advanced 2024 exam is scheduled for May 26, 2024. 
    The IIT Madras has been ranked 285th position in QS Ranking 2024.
description:
Indian Institute of Technology Madras is an institute of National Importance 
    that was established in the year 1959. IIT Madras is an autonomous statutory institute 
    administered by the IIT Council.  Indian Institute of Technology, Madras has ranked 1st in 
    the NIRF 2023 in the Overall category. The IIT Madras offers various courses at four levels 
    which include UG, PG, Diploma, and Doctoral level programmes.
exam: JEE Advanced, GATE, CAT, JAM
courses: B.Tech., M.Tech., B.S., M.S, Ph.D, M.Sc., MBA

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi
latest_news_and_events:
JEE Advanced 2024 exam is scheduled to be conducted on May 26, 2024. 
    The last date to download the GATE 2024 scorecard is May 31, 2024. 
    The IIT Delhi has been ranked in the 197th position as per QS Ranking.
description:
Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi popularly known as 
    IIT Delhi was established in the year 1961. The IIT Delhi has bagged the 
    3rd rank in the overall category and the 2nd rank in the engineering 
    category as per NIRF 2023 data. IIT Delhi offers various courses at UG, 
    PG and Doctoral level. IIT Delhi courses include B.Tech, B.Tech M.Tech, 
    M.E/M.Tech, M.S, M.Sc, and Ph.D. IIT Delhi admissions to B.Tech programmes 
    are through valid JEE Main/JEE Advanced scores.
exam: JEE Advanced, GATE, CAT, JAM, CEED, UCEED
courses: B.E, B.Tech., M.E., M.Tech., B.Des, M.S, Ph.D, M.Sc., MBA

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay
latest_news_and_events:
JEE Advanced 2024 exam is scheduled to be conducted on May 26, 2024. 
    Declaration of IIT JAM 1st admission list will be released on May 31, 2024. 
    IIT Bombay organises a Workshop on Consumer Neuroscience scheduled on May 2, 2024.
description:
Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay was established in 1958 
    in Powai, Mumbai (earlier known as Bombay) as the second 
    IIT in all of India with external financial assistance. As per NIRF Rankings 2023, 
    IIT Bombay has been ranked 10th in the management category, 3rd rank in engineering 
    and 4th rank in the overall category. IIT Bombay is recognised as the 'Institute of 
    Eminence ' by the University Grants Commission. The IIT Bombay has ranked 149th 
    position in the QS Ranking.
exam: JEE Advanced, GATE, CAT, JAM, CEED, UCEED
courses: B.Tech., M.Tech., BS, B.Des, MBA, Ph.D, M.Sc.

name: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur
latest_news_and_events:
JEE Advance 2024 exam is scheduled to be conducted in May 2024. 
    The IIT Kanpur has been ranked 278 in the QS Ranking. 
    IIT Kanpur invites applications for admission to July 2024 semester for various programmes.
description:
Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IITK) was established in 1959 by the 
    Government of India.  IIT Kanpur has been ranked 5th place in the overall category and 4th 
    place in the engineering category while 23 as per the NIRF 2023 report. IIT Kanpur courses 
    include B.Tech., BS, B.Tech., M.Tech., M.Sc., Ph.D., M.Tech, M.S., M.Sc., M.B.A., M.Des and 
    Ph.D. IIT Kanpur admissions for B.Tech programmes are done based on JEE Advanced scores. 
    For the PG courses, the admissions are done based on GATE/ CEED/ JAM/ JMET/CAT scores.
exam: JEE Advanced, GATE, CAT, JAM, CEED, COGJET
courses: B.E, B.Tech., M.E., M.Tech., BS, MS, Ph.D, M.Des., MBA

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee
latest_news_and_events: JEE Advanced 2024 exam is scheduled to be conducted on May 26, 2024.
description:
Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee was established in the year 1847. 
    According to NIRF 2023, IIT Roorkee has secured 8th place in the overall category. IIT 
    Roorkee offers courses at different levels such as undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral 
    levels. The IIT Roorkee courses are available in various fields which include engineering and 
    architecture, sciences, management and business administration, and animation and design streams.
exam: JEE Advanced, GATE, CAT, JAM, GMAT, CEED, UCEED
courses: B.Tech., B.Arch, M.Tech., M.Arch,, MBA, Ph.D, M.Sc., M.Des.

The fourth merit list of the CLAT 2024 exam will be released on May 20, 2024. 
    JEE Advanced examination will be held on May 26, 2024.
description:
Indian Institute of Technology was founded in the year 1951 by the Ministry of 
    Human Resource Development, Government of India. The IIT Kharagpur is placed 7th under the overall 
    category in the NIRF Ranking 2023. The institute offers multiple courses at undergraduate, 
    postgraduate, and doctoral level courses. The total number of IIT Kharagpur courses is around 464. 
    The IIT Kharagpur has been ranked 271 position in the QS Ranking.
exam: JEE Advanced, GATE, CAT, JAM, GMAT, CLAT PG

The Indian Institute of Technology, Guwahati, was established in 1994. IIT 
    Guwahati was ranked 9th in the research and overall categories by NIRF 2023. The IIT Guwahati 
    has secured 7th place in the engineering category in NIRF 2023. The IIT Guwahati has been 
    accredited by the NAAC. IITG offers multiple courses at three levels which include undergraduate,

    JEE Advanced 2024 is scheduled to be conducted on May 26, 2024. 
    IIT Hyderabad PG admissions for the 2024-25 academic year are currently open for applications. 
    The last date to download the GATE 2024 scorecard is May 31, 2024.
description:
Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad, was established in 2008 as a government 
    institute. The institute is also known as IITH or IIT Hyderabad. According to NIRF 2023, 
    IIT Hyderabad has been ranked 14 in the overall category and 8th in the engineering category. 
    IIT Hyderabad has ranked 691-700 in QS ranking 2024. IITH offers various courses in undergraduate, 
    postgraduate, and doctoral programmes.
exam: JEE Advanced, GATE, JAM, CEED, UCEED

name: National Institute of Technology, Tiruchirappalli
latest_news_and_events:
JEE Mains Session 2 results are out. 
    NIT Trichy MBA admissions 2024 shortlisted candidates have to attend 
    the online interview on scheduled dates - April 20, 21, 27 and 28, 2024. 
    NIT Trichy invites for MA admissions 2024-25, as CUET PG 2024 results are out.
description:
National Institute of Technology Tiruchirappalli (NIT Trichy) 
    was formerly known as Regional Engineering College and was established in 1964. 
    NIT Trichy has been approved by the UGC/AICTE. NIT Trichy ranking as per NIRF 2023 
    is 21 under the overall category. NIT Trichy stood at 9th under the engineering category, 
    and 35th under the management category in the NIRF 2023 Ranking.
exam: JEE Main, GATE, CAT, NIMSET
courses: B.Tech, B.Arch, M.Tech, M.Arch, M.Sc, MA, MBA, MCA, MS

name: Jadavpur University
latest_news_and_events:
WBJEE examination will be conducted by West Bengal Joint Entrance Examination 
    Boards on April 28, 2024, registered candidates have to appear in the examination for admission 2024.
description:
Jadavpur University Kolkata also known as JU Kolkata was established in 1955. 
    Jadavpur University is accredited by NAAC (National Assessment of Accreditation Council) with a 
    CGPA of 3.68 at A Grade and also accredited by the NBA. Jadavpur University provides full-time, 
    part-time and online programmes. Jadavpur University offers various undergraduate, postgraduate 
    and doctoral programmes.
exam: GATE, CAT, MAT, XAT, ATMA, GPAT, JEMAT, WBJECA, WBJEE
approvals: UGC, AICTE, Council of Architecture, PCI
courses: B.Tech., B.Pharma, B.Arch, B.Sc., B.A., B.P.Ed, B.Lib.I.Sc, B.Ed, M.Lib.I.Sc, M.Tech, M.Arch, MCA, M.Sc., M.A., M.Phil, Ph.D

name: Vellore Institute of Technology
latest_news_and_events:
1) JEE Main Results of Session 2 is out. Vist jeemain.nta.ac.in 
    to check the results. 2) As per the QS Ranking 2024, VIT Vellore ranked in the rank 
    band between 851 and 900. VIT Vellore QS ranking 2024, the university ranked 212 in 
    the engineering and technology stream. 3) Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore 
    ranked between 551 and 600 in the business and economics streams and between 401 and 
    450 in the natural sciences streams. VIT Vellore ranked 136 in the stream of computer 
    science according to the QS ranking 2024. 4) Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT),
     Vellore accepts SAT exam scores for admission to UG programmes. Interested candidates 
     can apply by visiting the official website. 5) VIT BTech admissions 2024 open; apply 
     through VITEEE. 6) VIT PG admissions 2024 open for MTech, MCA, and M.Des  programme; 
     Apply through VITMEE.
description:
Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT), Vellore is a private deemed university 
    established in 2001. VIT Vellore offers 72 courses in Engineering and Architecture, 
    Sciences, Law, Management and Business Administration, Computer Application and IT, Animation 
    and Design, Arts, Humanities and Social Sciences and Commerce streams. VIT Vellore admissions 
    are done on the basis of the entrance examination scores followed by the counselling process, 
    respectively. The university has separate hostel facilities for boys and girls to accommodate 
    outstation students. VIT Vellore offers scholarships to students based on their academic 
    records. The Career Development Centre (CDC) at Vellore Institute of Technology oversees the 
    placements drive at the university.
exam: GATE, JEE Main, VITEEE, CAT, GMAT, MAT, XAT, CLAT, CLAT PG, CMAT, ATMA, CEED, NMAT, LSAT-India, UCEED, AILET PG, VITMEE
courses: B.Com, BBA, B.Des, B.E, B.Tech, BCA, B.Sc (Hons), B.Arch, B.Sc, BA LLB (Hons), BBA LLB, M.E, M.Tech, M.Des, M.Sc, LLM, MBA, MCA, MSW, Ph.D

name: National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal
latest_news_and_events: 1) The CAT 2024 exam date is expected to be November 24, 2024.
description:
The National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NITK) Surathkal was formerly 
    known as Karnataka Regional Engineering College (KREC) Surathkal. The NITK Surathkal was 
    established in 1960. The NIT Surathkal courses include undergraduate, postgraduate, and 
    doctoral-level courses. The NITK Surathkal offers courses such as B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, M.Sc, 
    MCA, and Ph.D. The candidates should meet the NITK Surathkal eligibility criteria to get 
    admitted for the desired course. The NITK Surathkal fees depend on the course chosen by the 
    candidate. The NIT Surathkal admissions will be based on the scores obtained in the entrance 
    examination such as JEE Main/CAT/MAT/GATE/JAM/NIMCET/NET/UGC-CSIR exam/DAE- JEST.
exam: JEE Main, GATE, JAM, CAT, MAT, NIMCET
courses: B.Tech., M.Tech., MBA, M.Sc., MCA, Ph.D

Indian Institute of Technology Banaras Hindu University,

name: National Institute of Technology Rourkela

1) NIT Rourkela ranked 651-700 position in the QS Ranking in 
    Computer Science. 2) CAT exam registration will take place first week of August to 
    the second week of September 2024 (Tentatively).
description:
National Institute of Technology Rourkela was established in 1961 by the 
    Government of India. In the year 1961, it was established as Regional Engineering College. 
    NIRF 2023 Ranking of National Institute of Technology Rourkela is 37th in the overall category, 
    16th  in the engineering category, 29th in the research category, and 8th in the architecture 
    category. NIT Rourkela offers multiple courses at undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral 
    level courses. The NIT Rourkela course is available in various fields and it offers full-time 
    and online study mode courses. The NIT Rourkela admissions are offered for B.Tech, M.Tech, 
    B.Arch, B.Tech M.Tech, M.B.A, Executive M.B.A, Ph.D, and many others. The candidates seeking 
    admission must meet the NIT Rourkela eligibility criteria. The NIT Rourkela fees depend on the 
    course chosen by the candidate.
exam: GATE, CAT, JAM, MAT, XAT, CMAT, JEE Main
courses: B.Tech, B.Arch, M.Tech, M.Sc, M.A., MBA, Ph.D

The Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar was established in the

name: Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham
latest_news_and_events:
1) Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Coimbatore accepts SAT scores 
    for admissions to undergraduate courses. Candidates who are interested can apply for 
    admission by visiting the official website. 2) AVV Coimbatore result 2024 is out, 
    check the AEEE result 2024. 3) Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham MBA admission 2024 is open. 
    4) Amrita University will conduct the AEEE 2024 exam in two phases. The Amrita Phase 2 
    exam is scheduled from May 10 to May 14, 2024.
description:
Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Coimbatore is a private deemed university, 
    established in 2003. The Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham Coimbatore offers various undergraduate, 
    postgraduate, and doctoral programmes with different specialisations. Students must fulfil the 
    eligibility criteria and get valid score in relevant entrance exams. AVV Coimbatore admissions 
    are offered on the basis of candidates' merit. Moreover, the entrance exams accepted by Amrita 
    Vishwa Vidyapeetham Coimbatore are CAT/XAT/CMAT/MAT/GMAT/GRE/ AEEE/ JEE (Main).
exam: NEET, NEET PG, GATE, JEE Main, NEET MDS, CAT, GMAT, AEEE, MAT, XAT, NEET SS, Karnataka PGCET, CMAT, AIAPGET, KEAM, KMAT Kerala, PUEEE, ICAR AIEEA, GRE, CEETA-PG, TANCET
courses: B.Sc, BA (Hons), B.Tech, MBA, MA, MSW, Ph.D

Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology is a private

name: S.R.M. Institute of Science and Technology
latest_news_and_events: 1) SRMJEEE result is out. Candidates need to use the srmist login link to check the result at srmist.edu.in. 2) National Testing Agency has declared the JEE Main 2024 result for session 2 on April 24, 2024. Candidates can check the JEE Main session 2 result at jeemain.nta.ac.in. National Testing Agency conducted the JEE Main April session on April 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, and 12. 3) SRM Institute of Science and Technology accepts SAT scores. 4) SRM Institute of Technology admissions 2024 are open to UG and PG programmes. Candidates can apply by visiting the official website of SRMIST Chennai.
description: SRM Institute of Science and Technology Chennai (SRMIST Chennai) was established in 1985 and was formerly known as SRM University Chennai. SRM IST Chennai is a private institute located in Kattankulathur, Tamil Nadu. SRM Institute of Science and Technology is recognised by the University Grants Commission (UGC). SMR Institute of Science and Technology has more than 50,000 students enrolled and the total faculty strength at SRMIST is 3272. SRM Institute of Science and Technology offers a wide range of UG, PG, and doctoral courses in engineering, humanities, medicine, etc. SRM Institute of Science and Technology is commonly known as SRM University.
exam: NEET, NEET PG, GATE, NEET MDS, CAT, GMAT, NATA, MAT, CLAT, XAT, NEET SS, CMAT, SRMJEEE, CEED, NMAT, SRMJEEE PG, CUET UG, JEE Main, SRMJEEM, UCEED, NCHM JEE, SRMHCAT, CEETA-PG, TANCET
approvals: UGC, AICTE, Council of Architecture, NCTE
courses: B.Sc, B.Sc (Hons), B.Com, B.Com (Hons), BBA, BCA, B.Optom, B.Tech, B.Des, B.Arch, B.Ed
